# Conditionals

# Conditional v-if/v-else

# Input:

 




























<template>
  <div>
    <input
      @click="showing = !showing"
      class="switch"
      type="checkbox"
      id="switch"
      name="some-switch"
    />
    <label for="switch"></label>
    <p v-if="showing">"First Option"<span> /and its childs</span></p>
    <!-- The other value are NOT in the DOM -->
    <p v-else-if="!showing">"Second option"</p>
    <p v-else>Can't see me</p>
  </div>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  data: function() {
    return {
      showing: true,
    };
  },
};
</script>

<style scoped></style>
